title: Ep 112 | Phil and Jase Talk COVID-19 Fear and Fearmongering, Statues and Sin, and Anger Over Masks
description:
Jase notes that a lot of people are looking for salvation in a mask instead of Jesus. Phil has the latest Beaver Wars update. A coronavirus case in Missy's family leads to some questions for Jase, and he destroys the dishwasher to get to a penny. And a question from a college student struggling with self-forgiveness leads the guys to discuss statues, the sins of our Founders, and how sinners can share Jesus.
